ðŸ“– Summary: NiceGUI is a Python-based UI framework for building web-based GUIs. It offers a wide range of UI elements and features, enabling rapid development of interactive applications for various use cases, including dashboards and tools for robotics, smart homes, and machine learning. The framework supports features such as data binding, custom routes, and a testing framework.
